name: MINT TART
directions: Muddle 4 grapefruit segments, mint, agave nectar and lime juice in a cocktail shaker. Add the juice and rum, fill with ice, and shake to blend. Strain into a glass with ice and top with sparkling water.

name: CINNAMON CIDER
directions: Add hot apple cider and spiced rum into a glass rimmed with sugar and cinnamon.

name: HAPPY GO LUCKY
directions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: THE PHANTOM
directions: Mix sugar and food coloring until it has a thick, runny consistency. Pour onto a plate and dip the rim of a martini glass into it. Add remaining ingredients to an ice-filled cocktail shaker and shake well. Strain into your glass and enjoy!

name: LEMONBERRY SPLASH
directions: Muddle strawberries in a cocktail shaker. Add rum, juice and simple syrup. Fill with ice and shake well.  Strain mixture into a glass filled with ice and garnish with a strawberry. Enjoy!

name: PINA COLADA PUNCH
directions: Combine ingredients in a pitcher and stir. Refrigerate until chilled. Garnish with pineapple and serve!

name: SHAKE THE COCONUT
directions: Add all ingredients to an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake well and strain into a chilled glass.s

name: DARK & STORMY
directions: Pour ingredients into a glass filled with ice and stir. Garnish with a lime wedge and enjoy!

name: CITRUS BREEZE
directions: Combine lime juice and rum in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake to blend. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice and top with grapefruit soda. Garnish with a lime wedge, lean back, and relax!

name: TROPICAL SUNRISE
directions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and stir. Pour into a glass with ice and garnish with an orange slice.

name: STRAWBERRY SIPPER
directions: Combine ingredients in a blender filled with ice and puree until ice is thoroughly crushed. Pour into a glass and garnish with a strawberry slice.

name: Spiced Rum Punch
directions: In a small saucepan, combine cinnamon sticks, water and sugar. Stir and bring to a boil over medium-high heat.  Once boiling, remove from heat and let steep for 20 minutes.  Cool completely before making the punch.  In a large punch bowl or beverage dispenser, stir together spiced rum, spiced syrup, orange juice, lemon juice, sliced orange and sliced lime.  Fill with ice and serve chilled.

name: Classic Daiquiri
directions: All you have to do is shake it up with some ice to chill it, then pour it into a cocktail glass and serve with a lime wedge.

name: Classic Mojito
directions: In a cocktail shaker, muddle the mint leaves. (Here’s how to muddle mint)  Add the lime juice, simple syrup, and rum. Fill the cocktail shaker with ice and shake until cold.  Place ice into a glass, and strain in the liquid. Top off the glass with soda water. Garnish with additional mint leaves.

name: BLOODY RUM PUNCH
directions: Pour all ingredients into a punch bowl, stir well and chill for at least two hours before serving. Be sure to have the blood orange slices ready for garnish!

name: SAFE HARBOR
ingredients: Lime wedge and mint for garnish
directions: Add rum and lime juice to a tall glass filled with ice. Top with the ginger beer. Garnish with a lime wedge and mint leaves.

name: SPIDER CIDER
ingredients: A few dashes of cherry bitters
directions: Dip the rim of your glass in honey and dip the glass into sprinkles. Pour rum, apple cider and cherry extract into a mixing glass. Stir and pour over ice-filled glass.

name: MANGO SUNRISE PIÑA COLADA
directions: In a cocktail shaker with ice, add the rum, mango and pineapple juices. Shake well to combine and chill. Pour over ice into a cocktail glass. Top with coconut cream, grenadine and fresh pineapple for garnish. Enjoy!

name: JAMAICAN SUNSET
directions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake well and pour into a martini glass.

name: TEENY COLADA
directions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake well. Strain into a glass with ice and garnish with an umbrella!

name: COCONUT PEAR DELIGHT
directions: Combine rums, pear nectar,cream of coconut and and lime juice in an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice. Add a splash of club soda and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: HOT BUTTERED RUM
directions: In a warm glass mug, add brown sugar, lemon rind, cinnamon, cloves and nutmeg. Pour in rum and fill mug with boiling water. Drop in the butter and serve.

name: SPARKS FLY
directions: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl. Slowly stir in a cup of ice and serve.

name: CRAZY COCONUT
directions: Add all ingredients to a glass filled with ice. Squeeze lime wedges into glass. Stir well and garnish with a lime wheel

name: YES TO ESPRESSO
directions: Pour all ingredients into an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: POQUITO MOJITO
directions: Add lime wedges, mint sprigs, sugar and lime zest to a pitcher and muddle with a wooden spoon. Stir in sparkling water and rum and divide among 4 glasses.

name: MELLOW MARY
directions: In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine sugar, water and rosemary to make syrup. Boil until sugar dissolves. Turn off heat and steep for 15 minutes. Puree syrup, lemon juice, rum and watermelon in a blender. Pour into a glass and top with club soda.

name: CRANBERRY SPLASH
directions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice and shake well. Strain into a glass and add a splash of agave nectar.

name: CAMPFIRE MARGARITA
directions: Fill a glass with ice and add the rosemary and agave nectar to a cocktail shaker.  Muddle the rosemary then add the tequila, grapefruit and lime juices, and ice to the shaker.  Shake and strain into your glass. Garnish with a sprig and enjoy!

name: EL DIABLO
directions: Combine ice and tequila, top with ginger beer. Slowly pour in crème de cassis. Squeeze lime wedge over drink, drop, and serve.

name: TRIPLE SUNRISE
directions: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker and top with crushed ice. Let stand for five seconds, then shake vigorously for five seconds until fully blended. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with an orange slice. Sunshine in a glass!

name: GRAPEFRUIT MARGARITA
directions: Fill a glass with ice, then add tequila and orange liqueur. Stir well and top with grapefruit juice. Garnish with a grapefruit slice.

name: YELLOW ROSE OF TEXAS
directions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled halfway with ice and shake well. Strain into an ice-filled glass and garnish with an orange wedge!

name: APHRODITE
directions: placeholder directions

name: BEERGARITA
directions: Pour the beer into your glass, then stir in tequila, liqueur, lime juice and sugar. Fill with ice and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: RED LANTERN
directions: Place all ingredients except for the ginger ale in a cocktail shaker filled with ice and shake until blended. Strain into a highball or rocks glass. Top with ginger ale, garnish with the lime wedge, sip and relax!

name: MEZCALITA
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add the mezcal, lime juice, orange juice, Cointreau, and orange bitters. Shake well and pour into a glass rimmed with chili powder and salt. Garnish with a lime wedge and enjoy!

name: TEQUILA DERBY
directions: Dissolve the sugar in the water in the bottom of a tall glass. Add the mint leaves and muddle. Pack the glass with crushed ice, then pour the tequila over the ice. Stir, then add more crushed ice. Garnish with mint and toast to classics with a twist!

name: POISON APPLE
directions: Poke holes into apple slice and place in martini glass. Combine remaining ingredients in an ice-filled cocktail shaker and shake well. Strain over the apple into the glass.

name: KIWI COOLER
directions: Muddle mint, kiwi, sugar and vanilla in a cocktail shaker. Add ice and tequila and shake well. Pour into a glass, top with club soda and stir.

name: CHERRY RITA
directions: Add 1/4 cup cherries to bowl, sprinkle with sugar and muddle  Combine all ingredients in an ice-filled cocktail shaker and shake well.

name: CANTALOUPE CRUSH
directions: Blend cantaloupe, lime juice, orange liqueur and tequila in a blender until smooth. Pour into your glass and garnish with a mint sprig.

name: WATERMELON RITA
directions: Freeze watermelon chunks for 2 hours. Rim your margarita glasses with lime and salt. In a blender combine frozen watermelon, ice, lime juice, Avion tequila, Cointreau and blend until smooth. Garnish with a lime wedge and sprig of mint.

name: LIMELIGHT
directions: Rub a lime wedge around the rim of glass and dip rim in salt. Fill with ice,and add ingredients. Stir well and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: LEMON BASIL REFRESHER
directions: Muddle basil, lemon and a splash of agave nectar. Add ice, tequila and club soda and stir. Top with orange liqueur. Garnish with a lemon wedge and basil leaf.

name: CINCO DE MAYO SPICY PINEAPPLE MARGARITA
ingredients: Lime and salt for rimming glass
directions: Fill a shaker with ice. Add tequila, triple sec, pineapple juice, lime juice, and agave syrup. Shake and strain over ice. Top with jalapeno slices and garnish with pineapple wedge.s

name: BIG BATCH JALAPALOMA
directions: Pour all ingredients except club soda into a pitcher and stir. Chill for 1 hour. Rim glasses with lime and salt. Pour over ice, top with club soda. Garnish with lime and jalapeño. Enjoy!

name: EASTER SMOKING ROSE PALOMA
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and add the Sotol, lime juice and rose simple syrup. Shake and strain into the glass. Top with the grapefruit soda and stir. Garnish with grapefruit slice.

name: PALOMA RITA
directions: Combine tequila, juices, sugar and salt in a cocktail shaker and shake well.  Strain into a glass and top with grapefruit soda.

name: HONEYDEW MARGARITA
directions: Combine ingredients in a blender with ice and puree until smooth. Pour into a chilled glass and enjoy!

name: TEXAS SUNRISE
directions: placeholder directions

name: PINEAPPLE MEZCAL SOUR
directions: In a cocktail shaker combine ice, mezcal, pineapple juice, agave syrup, lime juice, and egg white. Shake until foamy. Strain into glass and add 3 drops of aromatic bitters.

name: PRICKLY PEAR RITA
directions: Combine tequila, liqueur, lime juice and syrup in a cocktail shaker and shake well. Pour into an ice-filled glass and enjoy!

name: ABOUT THYME LEMONADE
directions: Muddle thyme sprigs with sugar and 2 lemon wedges in a glass. Add tequila, ice and cold water to taste. Garnish with a lemon wedge and enjoy!
